name: Time Loop (Inkuantum)
description:
"Time Loop" - have you ever been stuck in a loop between three time travel destinations? No? Me neither! But you can experience this feeling  in this 2D platformer built in one week during the #BrackeysGameJam.

You are stuck in a house which is differently structured and built in every single year you time travel to. You'll have to rewind the time to when the house was still full, abandoned or rebuilt. Your goal is to get to the top of the house by completing a parkour trail. But be careful, it's not safe in there! Monsters and traps are waiting for you!

Controls are mentioned on the title screen! Good luck and stay safe!

Game created by Inkuantum and Greggy17
